																                    Newly Diagnosed Childhood Acute Myeloid Leukemia
																                    Treatment of newly diagnosed childhood acute myeloid leukemia may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy plus central nervous system sanctuary therapy with intrathecal chemotherapy.    - A clinic
